unexpectederror.title: An unexpected error has occurred.
unexpectederror.description: If it is not corrected, please visit our support server.

missingpermissions.title: Missing Permissions
missingpermissions.manage_messages: You must have `Manage Messages` permission to run this command.
missingpermissions.manage_guild: You must have `Manage Guild` permission to run this command.

panel.title: Easy-Verification
panel.description:
Click on the button to authenticate.
Roles will be assigned upon completion of authentication.

panel.title: Web verification
panel.description:
When you click the button, a one-time passcode and URL of the authentication page will be sent to your DM.
Enter the one-time passcode in the code entry field on the authentication page, link it to the Bot, and complete authentication.

* The DM must be made public.
* The one-time passcode is valid for 3 minutes.
* When you link with the Bot, the Bot will get your user name and user ID, but these information will not be saved.

language.title: Language has been changed
language.description: Bot language has been changed to `English`

error.not_played: Nothing is playing on this server.

pls_join_botvc.title: An error has occurred.
pls_join_botvc.description: Join the same voice channel as the bot.

queue.show: The top songs in the queue are shown.
